EmailTemplate.name: 2020 Honeywell AERO Tech Forum.Sorry We Missed You!
EmailTemplate.subject: You can still catch the first-ever Honeywell Tech Forum!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STILL TIME TO JOIN US We're sorry we missed you live at the first-ever Honeywell Tech Forum, but you can still explore all of the on-demand content <[[https://vshow.on24.com/vshow/HW2020/lobby/18102]]>, including our opening and closing sessions, transformation tracks by topic, the technology expo and business pages.
It was an incredible few weeks of content; and we hope youâ€™ll join us, on-demand, to learn how we can help you and your business, today and tomorrow. And be sure to take connected to our Honeywell team on how we can help make the future, together! STAY CONNECTED <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/forms/subscription-page]]>
